title: FS: Old Mill John Hummel SGC 30 Pop 1 of 1 None Higher
author: txaggie00

posts.post_title: FS: Old Mill John Hummel SGC 30 Pop 1 of 1 None Higher
posts.post_content:
FS: Old Mill John Hummel SGC 30 Pop 1 of 1 with None Graded Higher from either PSA or SGC. $1450 net to me through PayPal Family and Friends. 

I listed this card on EBay last evening and have had so much interest I thought I’d post it here to see if any Forum members are interested before I sell it. I’ve had multiple offers and will give it until 9 a.m. tomorrow before deciding whether to accept the best one. 

The first to respond I’ll take it will take precedence over PM’s. 
Please see my EBay listing with pics and other details. 

I’ll pay shipping and insurance through USPS Registered Mail. 
Thanks
